name: Abusing TP
description:
Objective is to get to the end of the maze. without getting bopped by the white circles.

Move around using WASD or arrows.

Hold down left shift to reduce movement speed.

Hold down right click to see teleport marker, left click at same time to use teleport (at the cost of 5000 score points).

Press R to restart.

Try and reach the box at the end with the highest score possible.
